Detailed Description

Component for the layouting/grouping of the UI-subcomponents.

Five different types of the layout/grouping are provided:
1. Vertical or horizontal placing of components without any visible container
2. Vertical or horizontal placing of components in a labeled group box
3. Vertical or horizontal placing of component in a splitted view
4. Tool box
5. Tab widget
